testcase.name: P0-FORM-1: Consignment Submission > POST /api/consignments > validates payload format (phone verification required for success)
P0-FORM-1: Consignment Submission > POST /api/consignments > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR when required fields missing
P0-FORM-1: Consignment Submission > POST /api/consignments > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR when email invalid
P0-FORM-1: Consignment Submission > POST /api/consignments > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR for extra unknown fields (strict schema)
P0-CRUD-4: Consignment Status Update > PATCH /api/consignments/:id/status > handles status update for existing consignment (authenticated)
P0-CRUD-4: Consignment Status Update > PATCH /api/consignments/:id/status > returns 401 when not authenticated
P0-CRUD-4: Consignment Status Update > PATCH /api/consignments/:id/status > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR for invalid status value
P0-CRUD-4: Consignment Status Update > PATCH /api/consignments/:id/status > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR for invalid id param
P0-CRUD-5: Convert Consignment to Inventory > POST /api/consignments/:id/approve > handles consignment approval (authenticated)
P0-CRUD-5: Convert Consignment to Inventory > POST /api/consignments/:id/approve > returns 401 when not authenticated
P0-AUTH: Authentication Endpoints > POST /api/auth/login (P0-AUTH-1) > returns 200 with valid credentials
P0-AUTH: Authentication Endpoints > POST /api/auth/login (P0-AUTH-1) > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR when username missing
P0-AUTH: Authentication Endpoints > POST /api/auth/login (P0-AUTH-1) > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR when password missing
P0-AUTH: Authentication Endpoints > POST /api/auth/login (P0-AUTH-1) > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR for extra unknown fields (strict schema)
P0-AUTH: Authentication Endpoints > POST /api/auth/login (P0-AUTH-1) > returns 401 for invalid password
P0-AUTH: Authentication Endpoints > POST /api/auth/logout (P0-AUTH-2) > returns 200 and clears session
P0-AUTH: Authentication Endpoints > GET /api/auth/session (P0-AUTH-3) > returns authenticated:false when not logged in
P0-AUTH: Authentication Endpoints > GET /api/auth/session (P0-AUTH-3) > returns authenticated:true after login
P0-FORM-5: Appointment Booking > POST /api/appointments > returns 200/201 with valid payload
P0-FORM-5: Appointment Booking > POST /api/appointments > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR when required fields missing
P0-FORM-5: Appointment Booking > POST /api/appointments > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR when appointmentType invalid
P0-FORM-5: Appointment Booking > POST /api/appointments > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR when email invalid
P0-FORM-5: Appointment Booking > POST /api/appointments > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR for extra unknown fields (strict schema)
P0-CRUD-1: Create Vehicle > POST /api/inventory > returns 201 with valid payload (authenticated)
P0-CRUD-1: Create Vehicle > POST /api/inventory > requires authentication for creation
P0-CRUD-1: Create Vehicle > POST /api/inventory > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR when required fields missing
P0-CRUD-1: Create Vehicle > POST /api/inventory > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR for extra unknown fields (strict schema)
P0-CRUD-2: Edit Vehicle > PATCH /api/inventory/:id > returns 200 with valid update (authenticated)
P0-CRUD-2: Edit Vehicle > PATCH /api/inventory/:id > returns 401 when not authenticated
P0-CRUD-2: Edit Vehicle > PATCH /api/inventory/:id > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR for invalid price
P0-CRUD-2: Edit Vehicle > PATCH /api/inventory/:id > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR for extra unknown fields (strict schema)
P0-CRUD-3: Delete Vehicle > DELETE /api/inventory/:id > returns 200 when deleting (authenticated)
P0-CRUD-3: Delete Vehicle > DELETE /api/inventory/:id > returns 401 when not authenticated
P0-PUB-1: Public Inventory Listing > GET /api/inventory > returns 200 with array of vehicles
P0-PUB-2: Public Vehicle Details > GET /api/inventory/:idOrSlug > returns 200 for existing vehicle
P0-PUB-2: Public Vehicle Details > GET /api/inventory/:idOrSlug > returns 404 for non-existent vehicle
P0-FORM-3: Trade-In Request > POST /api/trade-in > returns 200/201 with valid payload
P0-FORM-3: Trade-In Request > POST /api/trade-in > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR when required fields missing
P0-FORM-3: Trade-In Request > POST /api/trade-in > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR when condition invalid

P0-FORM-3: Trade-In Request > POST /api/trade-in > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR for extra unknown fields (strict schema)
P0-FORM-2: Vehicle Inquiry > POST /api/vehicle-inquiry > returns 200/201 with valid payload

P0-FORM-2: Vehicle Inquiry > POST /api/vehicle-inquiry > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR when required fields missing
P0-FORM-2: Vehicle Inquiry > POST /api/vehicle-inquiry > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR for extra unknown fields (strict schema)

P0-FORM-4: Credit Application > POST /api/credit-applications > returns 400 VALIDATION_ERROR when required fields missing
